items.sentence: Tom has been studying French with Mary two or three times a week.
Tom didn\'t want to spend any more time than necessary in Boston.
Tom was a jazz guitarist before he started playing country music.
The movie we saw last night was in French with English subtitles.
Tom built the house himself along with the help of a few friends.
Tom checked the contents of the bag that someone had left behind.
Tom took it for granted that Mary already knew what had happened.
Tom suggested that Mary sing the new song she\'d been practicing.
Tom got two beers out of the refrigerator and handed one to Mary.
I wish that I had eaten at that restaurant before it burned down.
